hero.title: Build the boldest <highlight>World Cup 2026 pool</highlight> and poke your crew, the office, and the usual suspects

In minutes you spin up the league, drag everyone into the fun, and our <emphasis>live leaderboard</emphasis> keeps the banter loud. Built for <strongDestructive>companies, HR squads, and friends who holler at every goal</strongDestructive>. <strongFinal>Smash start, light up the pool, and let the chaos roll.</strongFinal>

features.description: Here's the starter pack so no one zones out: <strongPrimary>VIP-style leagues</strongPrimary>, <emphasis>automatic score magic</emphasis>, and a <strongDestructive>one-time payment with zero soap opera twists</strongDestructive>. Built for companies, HR crews, and friends who live the World Cup with jokes and bragging rights.

create_leagues.title: VIP leagues with a velvet rope
create_leagues.description: Invite only the people you actually like—office squad, weekly five-a-side, or the family chat. You decide who gets past the bouncer.

live_scoring.title: Live scoring, Excel stays retired
live_scoring.description: We update every match on the fly. You just show off the leaderboard while spreadsheets collect dust.

one_time_payment.title: One-time payment, zero drama
one_time_payment.description: €1.99 per head and done. No sneaky subscriptions, no mystery fees hiding in fine print.

remote_play.title: Play from wherever WiFi you're in
remote_play.description: Remote work, airport layover, sofa mode—everyone can jump in and prove who actually knows football.

highlights.fast_start: Three clicks and the smack-talk begins

jsonld.name: How Porraza works for your World Cup 2026 pool
jsonld.description: Follow these steps to create your league, drop predictions, and enjoy live standings with your crew.

steps.title: Sign up in a blink
steps.description: Create your account with secure login. One-time fee per player, no subscriptions, no surprises.

steps.title: Launch your league or join instantly
steps.description: Open a private space for the office or friends, or hop in with a code in a couple of seconds.

steps.title: Drop your predictions
steps.description: Lock every pick before kickoff with a fast, no-fuss workflow that keeps the hype coming.

steps.title: Track the leaderboard and brag
steps.description: Watch live standings, fire off banter, and see who actually rules the World Cup.

cta.title: Jump in, set the league, and start bragging today

pricing.title: One payment and your <highlight>World Cup 2026 pool</highlight> is ready to roll
pricing.description: Skip the endless subscriptions: <strongPrimary>pay once</strongPrimary>, <emphasis>unlock everything</emphasis>, and the <strongDestructive>trash talk lasts all tournament</strongDestructive>.

validation.name_min: Give us at least 2 characters so we can slap your name on the leaderboard.

validation.password_min: Use at least 8 characters so it survives overtime.
validation.confirm_password_required: Please repeat the password to seal the play.
validation.passwords_mismatch: Those passwords aren’t playing on the same team.
